ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you make money?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya thats annoying I have a bard on Tunare and someone gave me a bunch of blackened alloy armour and I was only lvl 2 so I went to ec and someone scoffed at me
ygData.messageBody:
Ya thats annoying I have a bard on Tunare and someone
gave me a bunch of blackened alloy armour and I was
only lvl 2 so I went to ec and someone scoffed at me
saying I was a liar when I said someone gave me the
stuff~ but I have no money yeah I am so twinked~ I am
very happy for the stuff that was awesome I love that
someone would be so nice to my newbieness =o) I am
doing so well w/it =o)

Ecko~


--- "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@...> wrote:
> No one seemed to mind. I would wait for a little
> while before looting and no one would loot so I
> would.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Saturday, April 06, 2002 7:49 AM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you make money?
>
>
> They said it was ok for you to loot though, right?
> Just bc someone appears to be twinked doesn't mean
> they don't need money. I
> had someone who wouldn't let me loot in group bc
> he claimed I was twinked. I
> was around lvl 25 and wearing a Green Silk Drape
> and poking away with a
> drachnid leg tip that I bought off a merchant in
> Neriak. I had no money bc
> I'd spent it all on spells and the equipment that
> I had.
> Sorry, pet peeve. The attitude that someone with
> good gear doesn't have
> money can get you into trouble.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> I made about 300pp in the Highpass Basement just
> looting everything because
> everyone else was so twinked they don't need
> money.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Friday, April 05, 2002 10:07 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you make money?
>
>
> Don't forget buffing for donations. At lvl 30
> Rangers get sow. So you can
> sow for donations if no druids, beastlords, or
> shamans are around.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> I guess the obvious ways I can think of are to
> kill lots of green mobs.
> Camp
> items in dungeons. Practice trade skills. I have
> spent a great deal of
> time
> in the Highpass Basement and when I am in a
> group where everyone is
> twinked,
> they often let me get all the loot.
>
>
